Title: The DevOps Handbook
Author: Gene Kim
Desc: If you are looking for well-researched work with historical case and business studies you need to give it a try.

Title: Building Microservices
Author: Sam Newman
Desc: Very Good Introduction to Microservices covering topics like team building, versioning, logging, monitoring etc..

Title: Site Reliability Engineering
Author: Jenifer Petoff
Desc: How Google Runs Production Systems ? This book is answering this question in a well structured manner.

Title: Effective DevOps
Author: Jenifer Davis
Desc: Effective DevOps is not just a technical guide but it is also a cultural and managerial guide.

Title: The DevOps Toolkit
Author: Victor
Desc: A journey to build a full and stable CI/CD pipeline and support modern and distributed applications build on top of micro services architectures

Title: DevOps: A Software Architect's Perspective
Author: Len Bass
Desc: For software architects, this book is a very good reference to understand and master DevOps environments
